short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool enables users to scrape & organize their Order Data from various E-commerce Sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock your buying potential with the TrackMyBuying dashboard & Chrome Extension.

Stay up to date on all your Amazon orders and tracking numbers by combining your Buying Group & Amazon data on one convenient dashboard. 

Never lose track of another package or item again!
